name: Jho Vengeance
description:
A short game about the revenge of a samurai, in a world where dinosaurs survive the meteor (or whatever wiped them out) and evolve to the Feudal Age. 

Fight, loot, kill your target. Or die, revived, and try again.

Control:

  • LMB - Attack
  • RMB - Block and Parry
  • WASD - Movement
  • F - Throw projectiles
  • C - Eat consumables
  • Tab - Inventory menu
  • Esc- Pause menu

This game was made in a school project in a team of 4. You can check the game repo here: https://github.com/lamnguyenkhoa/JhoVengeance
